name: Circus Solitaire
description:
Circus Solitaire is an original solitaire game with the no-nonsense MmpApps card game interface.

Totally free. No in-app purchases.

Three versions available, 1-Card, 3-Card and Rush.

- Attempt to move all the cards onto the foundation (suit cards) built up from ACE to KING.

- The board columns are built down (KING to ACE) in alternate colors.

- Empty columns can be filled with any card.

- 3-Card: go through the reserve pile three cards at a time. Cycle the reserve pile as many times as you like.

- 1-Card: go through the reserve pile three cards at a time. No cycles.

- Rush: go through the reserve pile three times. First three cards at a time, then two, then one.
